data.author: Albert Einstein
data.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.

data.author: Walt Disney
data.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

data.author: Steve Jobs
data.quote: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.

data.author: Oprah Winfrey
data.quote: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.

data.author: Nelson Mandela
data.quote: It always seems impossible until it’s done.

data.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
data.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

data.author: Confucius
data.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.quote: The only limit to your impact is your imagination and commitment.

data.author: Dr. Seuss
data.quote: Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.quote: Whether you think you can or you think you can't, you're right.

data.author: Mahatma Gandhi
data.quote: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.

data.author: Babe Ruth
data.quote: Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.

data.author: Vince Lombardi
data.quote: Winners never quit and quitters never win.

data.author: Mark Twain
data.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.

data.author: Thomas Edison
data.quote: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.

data.author: Theodore Roosevelt
data.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.

data.author: Zig Ziglar
data.quote: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.

data.author: Brian Tracy
data.quote: Make your life a masterpiece; imagine no limitations on what you can be, have or do.

data.author: Les Brown
data.quote: Shoot for the moon. Even if you miss, you'll land among the stars.

data.author: Jim Rohn
data.quote: Either you run the day or the day runs you.

data.author: Aristotle
data.quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
